original: @272a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @272a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i ma h'a k'a l'ashta mantra sto tra n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i ma h'a k'a l'ashta mantra sto tra n'a ma /
translated: Shri Mahakalashtamamantrastotranam.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal nag po chen po'i bstong pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal nag po chen po'i bstong pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Praise in Eight Verses Called the Praise of Glorious Mahakala.

original: @272b dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @272b dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Mahakala.

original: aom grub par gyur cig /'byung po ro langs tshogs rnams ha ha h'um dang ki li ki li zhes sgrogs myur bar ni //
analyzed: aom grub par gyur cig /'byung po ro langs tshogs rnams ha ha h'um dang ki li ki li zhes sgrogs myur bar ni //
translated: Om, may it be accomplished! The assembly of bhutas and vetalas, roaring with ha ha hum and kili kili,

original: sku la rgyu ma'i phreng bas kun nas bklubs shing zhal du mi yi sha ni gsol mdzad cing //
analyzed: sku la rgyu ma'i phreng bas kun nas bklubs shing zhal du mi yi sha ni gsol mdzad cing //
translated: Adorned with a garland of entrails, consuming human flesh in their mouths,

original: 'dod pa'i gzugs dang mi sdug gzugs can kha tv'am gar bcas phyag g-yon mi yi thod pa bsnams //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i gzugs dang mi sdug gzugs can kha tv'am gar bcas phyag g-yon mi yi thod pa bsnams //
translated: With desirable forms and ugly forms, holding a katvanga and a human skull in the left hand,

original: spyan dmar smin ma ser zhing mche gtsigs ro yi gnas la dgyes pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis srungs //
analyzed: spyan dmar smin ma ser zhing mche gtsigs ro yi gnas la dgyes pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis srungs //
translated: With red eyes and yellow eyebrows, baring fangs, delighting in the abode of corpses, may you, the protector of the field, protect.

original: phem phem phem zhes sgrogs par byed cing so sor bskyod pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus na ni //
analyzed: phem phem phem zhes sgrogs par byed cing so sor bskyod pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus na ni //
translated: Phe·πÉ phe·πÉ phe·πÉ, resounding, in the midst of a great fire of individual movement,

original: mgo bo rnams kyis mgo yi phreng byas rab gsal 'jigs pa'i skur brgyan gshin rje dang mtshungs shing //
analyzed: mgo bo rnams kyis mgo yi phreng byas rab gsal 'jigs pa'i skur brgyan gshin rje dang mtshungs shing //
translated: With heads for a garland, a terrifyingly radiant body, and a form like that of the Lord of Death.

original: drag shul phyag gi dang po rnams kyis mi mgo ma lus 'dzin cing khrag skyugs bab pa gsol //
analyzed: drag shul phyag gi dang po rnams kyis mi mgo ma lus 'dzin cing khrag skyugs bab pa gsol //
translated: With your first hands, fierce ones, you hold all human heads and drink the blood that flows from them.

original: rol pas rol pa sel zhing me yis gang ba'i gnas la zhing skyong khyod kyis srung bar mdzod //
analyzed: rol pas rol pa sel zhing me yis gang ba'i gnas la zhing skyong khyod kyis srung bar mdzod //
translated: With your play, you clear away play, and in the place filled with fire, you, the protector of the field, protect.

original: ksham ksham ksham zhes bzong  pa'i sku can ca co sgrogs par byed pa'i gdug pa rnams bzung ste //
analyzed: ksham ksham ksham zhes bzong  pa'i sku can ca co sgrogs par byed pa'i gdug pa rnams bzung ste //
translated: With a body that roars ‚Äúk·π£a·πÉ k·π£a·πÉ k·π£a·πÉ,‚Äù you seize the howlers and the evil ones.üîΩStepping on them alone, you press them down, saying ‚Äúka ha ka ha,‚Äù and with the mantra of the blue rain cloud, you burn the evil ones with the mantra of the pa·π≠a and ca·π≠a families.

original: gcig bu gnon cing mnan nas ka ha ka ha brjod cing char sprin sngon po yi ni mdog / trim ksh'im shr'i yi sngags kyis gdug can pa tsa pa tsa'i rigs kyi sngags kyis kun nas sreg / bgegs rnams rab tu bskrad par mdzod cig sgrub po rnams
analyzed: gcig bu gnon cing mnan nas ka ha ka ha brjod cing char sprin sngon po yi ni mdog / trim ksh'im shr'i yi sngags kyis gdug can pa tsa pa tsa'i rigs kyi sngags kyis kun nas sreg / bgegs rnams rab tu bskrad par mdzod cig sgrub po rnams
translated: Drive away the obstructors, and for the practitioners,

original: kyi zhing gnas nges par zhing skyong mdzod //
analyzed: kyi zhing gnas nges par zhing skyong mdzod //
translated: you definitely protect the field.

original: gang zhig dus rnams kun du hi ta ta zhes bzhad pa'i sgra yis shin tu 'jigs mdzad cing //
analyzed: gang zhig dus rnams kun du hi ta ta zhes bzhad pa'i sgra yis shin tu 'jigs mdzad cing //
translated: Who at all times with the sound of laughter, ‚ÄúHƒÅ hƒÅ,‚Äù frightens greatly,üîΩAnd with the mantra of the cattle, ‚ÄúHum hum phat,‚Äù the destroyer of obstacles, each day attaining the stainless, the color of a cloud,

original: phyugs rnams kyi ni sngags dang bgegs 'jig nyi ma re re dri med brnyes pa chu 'dzin mdog / h'um h'um phat ces drag po'i sgra yis srid pa gnyis po'i khong ni ma lus 'gengs nus shing //
analyzed: phyugs rnams kyi ni sngags dang bgegs 'jig nyi ma re re dri med brnyes pa chu 'dzin mdog / h'um h'um phat ces drag po'i sgra yis srid pa gnyis po'i khong ni ma lus 'gengs nus shing //
translated: Capable of filling the entire space of the two existences,

original: dbu skra dang ni sma ra ser zhing nye bar spyod pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis srung bar mdzod //üîΩkham kham kham zhes phyag g-yas gri gug ral gris bgegs rnams la rol khrag 'thung ba la dges //
analyzed: dbu skra dang ni sma ra ser zhing nye bar spyod pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis srung bar mdzod // kham kham kham zhes phyag g-yas gri gug ral gris bgegs rnams la rol khrag 'thung ba la dges //
translated: You, the protector of the field of enjoyment, with yellow hair and beard, protect!üîΩ‚Äú Kha kha kha,‚Äù with the right hand, a flaying knife and sword, you enjoy the obstructors, delighting in drinking blood.

original: ram ram ram zhes spyan dmar du ru ru zhas phyag ni khrag gis brgyan cing gtum pa'i shugs //
analyzed: ram ram ram zhes spyan dmar du ru ru zhas phyag ni khrag gis brgyan cing gtum pa'i shugs //
translated: ‚Äú Ram ram ram,‚Äù with red eyes, ‚Äúduru duru,‚Äù with hands adorned by blood, you are fierce.

original: krum krum krum zhes khros pa'i spyan gyis gzigs par mdzad cing bgegs rnams khyod kyis sgyur bar mdzad //
analyzed: krum krum krum zhes khros pa'i spyan gyis gzigs par mdzad cing bgegs rnams khyod kyis sgyur bar mdzad //
translated: ‚Äú Crum crum crum,‚Äù you look with angry eyes, you transform the obstructors.

original: dam dam dam zhes 'di yis 'dul mdzad rngam dang gtum dang bcas pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis srungs //üîΩkrim krim krum zhes mnan @273a * //
analyzed: dam dam dam zhes 'di yis 'dul mdzad rngam dang gtum dang bcas pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis srungs // krim krim krum zhes mnan @273a * //
translated: You, the fierce protector of the field, with wrath and ferocity, protect with dam dam dam!üîΩWith krim krim khrum, trample on the enemies, the afflictions, and definitely afflict them!

original: bas dgra bo nyon mongs pa rnams nges par nyon mongs par mdzod cig / kam kam kam zhes thod pa'i phreng bas sku la spras shing nag po'i mthu dang 'dra ba'i sku //
analyzed: bas dgra bo nyon mongs pa rnams nges par nyon mongs par mdzod cig / kam kam kam zhes thod pa'i phreng bas sku la spras shing nag po'i mthu dang 'dra ba'i sku //
translated: With kam kam kam, your body is adorned with a garland of skulls, and your body is like the power of darkness.

original: tsam tsam tsam zhes gtum pa'i shugs kyis rab g-yo rmad du byung bas 'jig rten snang mdzad cing //
analyzed: tsam tsam tsam zhes gtum pa'i shugs kyis rab g-yo rmad du byung bas 'jig rten snang mdzad cing //
translated: With tsam tsam tsham, you are stirred by the force of wrath, and you illuminate the world with your marvelousness.

original: sam sam sam zhes tshogs pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig thos 'dzin zhing skyong gang yin khyod kyis skyongs //
analyzed: sam sam sam zhes tshogs pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig thos 'dzin zhing skyong gang yin khyod kyis skyongs //
translated: With sam sam sam, you are the lord of the assembly, the protector of the field who holds the commitments and the Dharma. Protect!

original: yam yam yam zhes sna tshogs gshin rje ltar 'gro dri ma med pa'i chu bzhin gzigs mdzad cing //
analyzed: yam yam yam zhes sna tshogs gshin rje ltar 'gro dri ma med pa'i chu bzhin gzigs mdzad cing //
translated: With yam yam yam, you move like the various Yamas, and you see like the stainless waters.

original: bam bam bam zhes rlung gi shugs kyis myur du rgyu zhing nyon mongs 'jig rten skyong ba mnyes //
analyzed: bam bam bam zhes rlung gi shugs kyis myur du rgyu zhing nyon mongs 'jig rten skyong ba mnyes //
translated: With bam bam bam, you move quickly with the speed of the wind, and you please the protector of the afflicted world.

original: bam bam bam zhes 'jigs pa'i khro gnyer mchog gi 'jigs mdzad nus pa'i kha gdangs sha za zhing //
analyzed: bam bam bam zhes 'jigs pa'i khro gnyer mchog gi 'jigs mdzad nus pa'i kha gdangs sha za zhing //
translated: Bham bham bham‚Äîwith a terrifying frown, you open your mouth wide and devour flesh.

original: ksham ksham ksham zhes phan par mdzad cing gnod pa skad cig gis sel zhing skyod khyod kyis skyongs //
analyzed: ksham ksham ksham zhes phan par mdzad cing gnod pa skad cig gis sel zhing skyod khyod kyis skyongs //
translated: Ksham ksham ksham‚Äîyou are helpful, you remove harm in an instant, you protect.

original: klam klim klum zhes gdug pa'i gzugs kyis srid gsum nyin mtshan dus kun nyon mongs gyur pa gang //
analyzed: klam klim klum zhes gdug pa'i gzugs kyis srid gsum nyin mtshan dus kun nyon mongs gyur pa gang //
translated: Klam klam klam‚Äîwith a terrible form, you torment the three worlds day and night.

original: pam pam pam zhes thugs rje'i zhags pas byol song rnams 'dzin phyag gis gdul bya rnams skyong ba //
analyzed: pam pam pam zhes thugs rje'i zhags pas byol song rnams 'dzin phyag gis gdul bya rnams skyong ba //
translated: Pam pam pam‚Äîwith a noose of compassion, you catch the animals, with your hand you protect those to be tamed.

original: sngags bdag sngags kyi sku can blo yi sngags pa rnams la blo gros 'bras bu mtshungs med ster //
analyzed: sngags bdag sngags kyi sku can blo yi sngags pa rnams la blo gros 'bras bu mtshungs med ster //
translated: You are the lord of mantras, with a mantra body, you give the mantra practitioners incomparable results.

original: zhing rnams srung bar mdzad pa khyod kyis 'gro ba'i lus rnams ma lus yun ring bskyad du gsol //
analyzed: zhing rnams srung bar mdzad pa khyod kyis 'gro ba'i lus rnams ma lus yun ring bskyad du gsol //
translated: You who protect the fields, please nourish all the bodies of beings for a long time.

original: sgrub pa po yi slob dpon blo ldan dam tshig thos 'dzin gang zhig gus pa dang ldan pas //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yi slob dpon blo ldan dam tshig thos 'dzin gang zhig gus pa dang ldan pas //
translated: The wise teacher of the practitioner, who is devoted and holds the sacred bonds,

original: thun gnyis su ni sngags rnams brgyad po klog byed de ni bsod nams ldan par 'gyur ba dang // sa stengs dang ni mtho ris su ni de yi rtag tu bgegs rnams rtag tu nyams 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: thun gnyis su ni sngags rnams brgyad po klog byed de ni bsod nams ldan par 'gyur ba dang // sa stengs dang ni mtho ris su ni de yi rtag tu bgegs rnams rtag tu nyams 'gyur zhing //
translated: and his obstacles will always be destroyed on earth and in the heavens.

original: tshe dang dpal dang grags dang 'byor 'dzin stengs dang mthu dang gzi brjid rgyas par mtshungs med 'gyur //üîΩdpal nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: tshe dang dpal dang grags dang 'byor 'dzin stengs dang mthu dang gzi brjid rgyas par mtshungs med 'gyur // dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
translated: He will be incomparable in longevity, glory, fame, wealth, power, and splendor.üîΩThe Eight-Line Praise of Glorious MahƒÅkƒÅla

original: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'o//
analyzed: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'o//
